name: Diesel - Whiskey Row Founder's Collection - Boxergrail
additionalNotes:
The original cigar that started a titan of the industry. Blended in Esteli, Nicaragua by master of all-things-cigar A.J. Fernandez, Diesel utilizes bold Pennsylvania Broadleaf wrapper leaves, and Nicaraguan long-fillers grown in the jet black, volcanic soils of Nicaragua. Originally offered in just the
